songs.lyrics:
Kyonki

Chandigarh  pichhe saara
Laake  tu rakhiya rakhiya
Solah ton chhaddi ekda
Bra bra bracket saara
Bring  it back !

Chandigarh  pichhe saara
Laake tu rakhiya ni
Sola  ton chhaddi ekda
Bracket saara patteya ni

Nikle jab tu sarhkon pe
Aate jaate larhkon ke
Aiven  BP se khele ae ae ae
Rukk ja baby saans toh le le
Saans toh le le

Oh baby plan banati ae
Par kabhi na time pe aati ae
Magar jab nain milati ae
To traffic jam karati ae

Baby crazy ae
Naache club mein zor laga ke
Baby mein barhi teji ae
Bina pankh ke mor bana de

Yeh maal thoda mawaali ae
Har sentence mein daali ae
Na bomb hai na patakha hai
Yeh ladki poori diwali ae
Boom !
Bring it back !

Ambarsar rakhdi kara ke
Kurhiye bang bang tu
Chakkran vich paake rakhdi
Tu mundeyan di gang nu
Ambarsar rakhdi kara ke
Kurhiye bang bang tu
Chakkran vich paake rakhdi
Tu mundeyan di gang nu

Gabhru vi tere pichhe
Hai sentimental ni
Enna vi rude na ban tu
Ban thoda gentle ni
Duniya tera paani bhardi
Akhan naal gallan kardi
Chhad di na kujh vi palle

Ruk ja baby saans toh le le
Saans toh le le
It’s your boy gabhru !
Saans to le le
songs.title: Saans To Le Le
